div.p: See below for the best sources to get answers to your questions during the district closure.

Call 903-224-5761 for family support
Open M-F from 4:30- 8:30 p.m.
Select Option 1 for English or Option 2 for Spanish.

p.span: A receptionist will answer to get your question and contact information, then a Student Services staff member will return your call to provide the requested information and resources.

td.span: Behavior support resources for families and teachers
Community resources to support students, families and community members

p.span: District communications and general questions not addressed elsewhere

td.span: Parenting resources to help families cope as we navigate this new world of learning at home

br.span: Support for families who are in temporary housing or unsheltered
Support for families who are providing family or foster care through DFPS

div.p: The Garland Independent School District exists as a diverse community with a shared vision that serves to provide an exceptional education to all its students.
